local_intent: Perceive the white plate, approach and align tightly, lower until contact, and verify contact.
assumptions: White plate is within sensor view and reachable
Robot is homed and can perform fine approach motions
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT segment around the LowerUntilContact on the white_plate: perception → approach/align → lower → verify. max_depth adjusted to nearest binned value (0.05) to comply with port_value_spaces.
